DOC.brief_summary: The Investigators goal study effect high flow nasal cannula oxygen ( HFNC ) rate post-operative pulmonary complication thoracic surgical patient . The Investigators hypothesis prophylactic HFNC oxygen , compare standard oxygen treatment , reduce incidence postoperative pulmonary complication , improve post-operative pulmonary function , reduce ICU hospital length stay .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Prophylactic High Flow Nasal Oxygen Post-Operative Thoracic Surgical Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The Investigators goal study effect high flow nasal cannula oxygen ( HFNC ) rate post-operative pulmonary complication thoracic surgical patient . The Investigators hypothesis prophylactic HFNC oxygen , compare standard oxygen treatment , reduce incidence postoperative pulmonary complication , improve post-operative pulmonary function , reduce ICU hospital length stay .
DOC.criteria: Undergoing Thoracic surgery Planned admission ICU surgery Younger 18 Pregnant Breast feed Known diagnosis obstructive sleep apnea Current previous lung transplant Pneumonectomy Home oxygen great 4L/minute Inability adhere assign treatment prior 48 hour surgery transfer floor
